J8ahqXjUhAAC.title: Web Site Measurement Hacks
author: Eric Peterson
J8ahqXjUhAAC.description: Helps organizations and individual operators in making the most of their Web investment by providing tools, techniques, and strategies for measuring their site's overall effectiveness. Providing the definitions of commonly-used terms, this book teaches how to gather crucial marketing data, how to drive potential customers to action, and more.
